title: Ample closet space with organizers, Control-entry access
posting_body: MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME IN DOWNTOWN OLYMPIA
Boardwalk Apartments is pleased to offer affordable senior living (income restrictions apply).
Vibrant living in the heart of downtown Olympia is what you’ll discover at Boardwalk Apartments.
Enjoy an active senior living community convenient to transportation, shopping, and healthcare.
Entertain or rest and relax in your affordable 1 or 2 bedroom apartment, that just feels like home.
Choose Boardwalk Apartments and enjoy less stress and more freedom to do the things that are important to you.
Want more information on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 431 Sq.
- Carpeting in living rooms and bedrooms
- Conveniently located on a major bus route
- Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)
Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply).
Please visit our website for additional details.
Office are located near the parking lot, located off of Washington street.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
